review: You can watch as many Youtubers as you want in preperation for this game. There is still no way that this won't screw with you. Very creepy, and really scary. I tip my hat to you.

This game is absolutely amazing. Even if the choices don't have as strong an effect as they do in other Telltale Games, the story and the character really put you in Westeros. My only issue would be graphics but it really doesn't matter. This is a Game of Thrones fan must-have.

This is an excellent story, That's what it is. Something that has you intrigued through and tugs at your heartstrings in the third act. With the musical accompaniment, the atmosphere of every scene was almost perfectly toned. This is a beautiful story. I won't be forgetting it any time soon.
